entry.title: aldotobing/deepseek-cloudflare-proxy: A lightweight Cloudflare Worker that acts as a secure reverse proxy to the DeepSeek AI API.
entry.content: A lightweight Cloudflare Worker that acts as a secure reverse proxy to the DeepSeek AI API.

entry.title: Amritasri10/Keeper-App: Keeper App is a simple React-based note-taking app that lets you create, view, and delete notes. It saves data locally in your browser using localStorage, so your notes persist without needing a backend. This lightweight app is great for learning React fundamentals and managing client-side data.
entry.content: Keeper App is a simple React-based note-taking app that lets you create, view, and delete notes. It saves data locally in your browser using localStorage, so your notes persist without needing a backend. This lightweight app is great for learning React fundamentals and managing client-side data.

entry.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

entry.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

entry.title: wasehabbasi/google-map-scraper: A lightweight Chrome extension built with JavaScript that scrapes business data from Google Maps. Extracts information such as business name, address, phone number, website, and ratings. Useful for lead generation, local SEO research, and data analysis.

entry.title: vdharmendra/NodeExpressDate-Template: NodeExpressDate is a lightweight Node.js application built with Express and body-parser that processes HTTP requests based on dynamic Date and time conditions. It demonstrates conditional routing using JavaScriptâ€™s Date object and if/else logic, making it a practical example for learning date-based API responses in a Node.js environment.
entry.content: NodeExpressDate is a lightweight Node.js application built with Express and body-parser that processes HTTP requests based on dynamic Date and time conditions. It demonstrates conditional routing using JavaScriptâ€™s Date object and if/else logic, making it a practical example for learning date-based API responses in a Node.js environment.
